Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Barry
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Belmont, Halsted and Clark due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Belmont, Halsted and Clark, due to street blockage near Broadway/Barry.

Allow extra travel time.
